name: Send.NET
short_description:
Send.NET is a .NET/Mono tool that sends files to a target computer by using Drag&Drop.

The software runs under Microsoft .NET 4 or any other compatible runtime environment.
summary: Small drag&drop tool that sends files to a target system.
